charges.charge_description: 18::1029(a)(3)&;(a)(4), 371&;1029(b)(2) KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY CONSPRIRING WITH OTHERS
18:371 &; 1029(b)(2) Conspiracy to Commit Access Device Fraud(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 85 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 2 years. The defendant is ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $227,926.00. It is further ordered that the defendant shall pay to the United States a special assessment of $500.00.

charges.charge_description: 18:371 &; 1029(b)(2) Conspiracy to Commit Access Device Fraud(1)

charges.charge_disposition: ORIGINAL: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP to be imprisoned for a term of 70 months on each count, to be served concurrently. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release with standard and special conditions for a term of 2 years on each count, to be served concurrently. No fine. $227,926 in restitution ordered. $500 total special assessment fee. AMENDED: Restitution reduced to $82,624.84 and payees determined.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to time served and shall be placed on supervised release with standard and special conditions for a term of 3 years. No fine. Restitution ordered jointly and severally in the amount of $82,624.84. $500 total special assessment fee.
